Content.Question: robot: A central European system of serfdom, by which a tenant's rent was paid in forced labour or service. Now historical.Noun. Listed as a main definition. The original source of this word is listed as J. Paget. This word was first recored in 1839
Content.SuperMemoReference: <H5 dir=ltr align=left><Font size="1" style="color: transparent"> SuperMemo Reference:</font><br><FONT class=reference>Title:"My Test Quote" <br>Source: Oxford English Dictionary

Content.Question: robot: Chiefly Science Fiction. An intelligent artificial being typically made of metal and resembling in some way a human or other animal.Noun. Listed as a main definition. The original source of this word is listed as New York Times. This word was first recored in 1922
Content.SuperMemoReference: <H5 dir=ltr align=left><Font size="1" style="color: transparent"> SuperMemo Reference:</font><br><FONT class=reference>Title:"My Test Quote" <br>Source: Oxford English Dictionary
